## TilingScheme class

The `TilingScheme` represents how the data is tiled.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class TilingScheme 
```

## Constructors

|  Constructor | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [(constructor)(subdivisionScheme, projection)](./harp-geoutils.tilingscheme._constructor_.md) |  | Constructs a new <code>TilingScheme</code> with the given subdivision scheme and projection. |

## Methods

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [getGeoBox(tileKey)](./harp-geoutils.tilingscheme.getgeobox.md) |  | Returns the bounding box in geo coordinates for the given \[\[TileKey\]\]. |
|  [getSubTileKeys(tileKey)](./harp-geoutils.tilingscheme.getsubtilekeys.md) |  | Returns the sub tile keys of the given tile. |
|  [getTileKey(geoPoint, level)](./harp-geoutils.tilingscheme.gettilekey.md) |  | Gets the \[\[TileKey\]\] from the given geo position and level. |

|  [getWorldBox(tileKey, result)](./harp-geoutils.tilingscheme.getworldbox.md) |  | Returns the bounding box in world coordinates. |
